scripts.deploy: npm run install:be && npm run install:fe && npm run install:db && npm run install:laravel
scripts.install:db: npm run create:db && npm run create:db-user && npm run flush:db
scripts.create:db: docker compose up -d && docker exec db mysql -uroot -proot -e 'CREATE DATABASE laravel;'
scripts.create:db-user: docker exec db mysql -uroot -proot -e "GRANT ALL ON laravel.* TO 'laraveluser'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'root';"
scripts.tests: docker exec api php artisan test --parallel --order-by=random --recreate-databases
scripts.test: docker exec -it api php artisan test --filter=
scripts.test:coverage: docker exec api php vendor/bin/phpunit --coverage-html html
